query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS siteProductivityGoals (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  constructionId INT NOT NULL,
  workerId INT NOT NULL,
  dailyGoal DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  weeklyGoal DECIMAL(10, 2),
  unit VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'unidades' NOT NULL,
  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  createdBy INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX constructionId_idx (constructionId),
  INDEX workerId_idx (workerId),
  INDEX active_idx (active)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS siteProductivityAlerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  constructionId INT NOT NULL,
  workerId INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  actualQuantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  goalQuantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  percentageAchieved DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
  alertType ENUM('above_goal', 'below_goal', 'on_target') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('unread', 'read', 'acknowledged') DEFAULT 'unread' NOT NULL,
  notifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledgedBy INT NULL,
  acknowledgedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX constructionId_idx (constructionId),
  INDEX workerId_idx (workerId),
  INDEX date_idx (date),
  INDEX alertType_idx (alertType),
  INDEX status_idx (status)
);

  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  createdBy INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX constructionId_idx (constructionId),
  INDEX workerId_idx (workerId),
  INDEX active_idx (active)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS siteProductivityAlerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  constructionId INT NOT NULL,
  workerId INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  actualQuantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  goalQuantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  percentageAchieved DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
  alertType ENUM('above_goal', 'below_goal', 'on_target') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('unread', 'read', 'acknowledged') DEFAULT 'unread' NOT NULL,
  notifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledgedBy INT NULL,
  acknowledgedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX constructionId_idx (constructionId),
  INDEX workerId_idx (workerId),
  INDEX date_idx (date),
  INDEX alertType_idx (alertType),
  INDEX status_idx (status)
);
